org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api

Interface Reader<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the record that can be emitted with this record writer
    All Superinterfaces:
    ReaderBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecordReader, UnionRecordReader

    public interface Reader<T extends IOReadableWritable>
extends ReaderBase
    A reader interface to read records from an input.
